title: installing pytorch via Conda will also install torch from pip?!
body_html:
Hi there,
When installing pytorch via conda

conda install -n test -c pytorch pytorch torchvision

It shows in the exported environment.yml that it installed both pytorch and torchvision via conda, but also shows in the bottom that it installed torch==0.4.1 under pip, why is that?

I only want the packages via Conda, not pip. any help

body:
Hi there,
When installing pytorch via conda
```
conda install -n test -c pytorch pytorch torchvision
```
It shows in the exported environment.yml that it installed both pytorch and torchvision via conda, but also shows in the bottom that it installed `torch==0.4.1` under `pip`, why is that?

I only want the packages via Conda, not pip. any help
